name: Bunny Reproduction
description:
In Bunny Reproduction you're Mike a new employee starting on a farm, where he will have to keep the number of bunnies as low as possible and avoid put them together in order to protect the plantation!

Run, Jump & Catch all the cute bunnies!

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse Left Click - Use tool
  • Escape (ESC) - Pause
  • Federico Alvarez (Development, Design,  UI/UX, etc)
  • Asset Store
    • Quirky Series - Animals Mega Pack
  • Open Game Art
    • Jack Menhorn - FPS Placeholder sounds
    • FoxSynergy - Music Box Monster
    • Listener - Win sound effect
  • Sketchfab
    • MMKH - Catch net
    • SuperMopsek - Bubble Gun
    • Onigraphics - Scarecrow
